name: Play Notes
content: This block lets you play strings of notes, called arpeggios, using a number of different instruments. Select notes on the piano to add them to the arpeggio - you can select up to sixteen. The notes can be played in several different sequences - going up, going down, at random, or all together.

palette_params.name: Sequence
palette_params.description: Selects the pattern to play the notes in. "Arpeggio Up" plays the notes going from lowest to highest, and then repeats. "Arpeggio Down" plays the notes going from highest to lowest. "Random" will play the notes in a completely random order. "Together" plays all the notes at once. This is useful for making chords.

short_description: Play a sequence of notes using a variety of instruments.
